meta_description: Explore the art of our time.
hours_text:
##  Second navigation 

* * *

Welcome! Find everything you need to plan your trip to one of the largest modern and contemporary art museums in the United States. Before your visit, see our **[Guidelines for Visiting SFMOMA](http://web.archive.org/web/20251218230128/https://www.sfmoma.org/visit/visitor-guidelines/)** to ensure a safe and memorable museum experience.

### Ticket Prices

Member | Free (Not a member? [Join now](/web/20251218230128/https://www.sfmoma.org/become-a-member/).)  
---|---  
Adult | $30  
Senior (65 years and older) | $25  
Students (full time, with ID) | $23  
Age 18 and younger | Free  
San Francisco CityPASS® | [Save up to 46%](http://web.archive.org/web/20251218230128/https://www.citypass.com/san-francisco?mv_source=sfmoma&campaign=visit)  
San Francisco Go City | [Save up to 50%](http://web.archive.org/web/20251218230128/https://gocity.com/san-francisco/en-us?utm_medium=affiliate&utm_source=partnerize&utm_campaign=gocity&utm_adcampaigngroup=gocity&utm_publisher=sfmoma&utm_referrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.sfmoma.org%2F&utm_content=Content&utm_creative=0)  
Groups | [See group discounts](http://web.archive.org/web/20251218230128/https://www.sfmoma.org/visit/group-visits/)  
  
Conference and convention attendees at Moscone Center can receive a $4 discount by showing their badge at the ticketing desk. Learn about additional [free and discounted admission offerings](http://web.archive.org/web/20251218230128/https://www.sfmoma.org/deals-discounts/).

Welcome! Find everything you need to plan your trip to one of the largest modern and contemporary art museums in the United States. Before your visit, see our **[Guidelines for Visiting SFMOMA](http://web.archive.org/web/20251218230128/https://www.sfmoma.org/visit/visitor-guidelines/)** to ensure a safe and memorable museum experience.
